alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Spokane Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued October 31 at 8:35PM PDT until November 01 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will continue to trap pollutants near the ground with deteriorated air quality. * WHERE...Portions of North Idaho. Portions of Central, North Central, and Northeast Washington. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A weather system Wednesday Night and Thursday will bring widespread precipitation to the region with the stagnant pattern ending.
info.instruction: Buildup of fine pollution particles can be harmful to those sensitive to air pollution including people with lung and heart problems, people with diabetes, children and the elderly.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Spokane Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
